kodkod.engine.fol2sat
Class TrivialFormulaException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          kodkod.engine.fol2sat.TrivialFormulaException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class TrivialFormulaException
extends java.lang.Exception

Thrown when a formula is found to be trivially (un)satisfiable with respect to given Bounds.

Author:
Emina Torlak
See Also:
